page.title: 09VILLAGE COMMUNITY,EAST COKER
page.content: Something of the flavour of life in the area may be distilled from items reported in one edition of the{local {newspaper. Members of the{"Time to Share"}club for the elderly celebrated the 10th anniversary of its founding with a party whilst the youth of the village, the{Scout Troop,}raised Â£120 at a jumble sale.In the same week a new {swimming pool}at the village school was opened,the cost raised by the school's Parent-Teacher Association. At the{Alpha Gallery}sculpture by a local artist aroused interest.Ladies of the{Keep Fit}group prepared Sunday lunch for 200 at the village hall, raising money for one of their charities. Finally,notice was given of an{Open {Gardens Day}to raise money for the {Church Restoration Fund.
